snippet.title: Caves of Qud - Early Access
snippet.description:
Caves of Qud is a science fantasy roguelike epic steeped in retrofuturism, deep simulation, and swathes of sentient plants. Come inhabit an exotic world and chisel through layers of thousand-year-old civilizations. Decide: is it a dying earth, or is it on the verge of rebirth?

http://store.steampowered.com/app/333640

http://www.freeholdgames.com
Music by Brandon R. Tanner (https://www.youtube.com/user/TheoryGuy83/videos)
Voiceover by Melanie Ehrlich (http://www.melanieehrlich.com)
